page.title: 16INFORMATION SYTEMS:FLEET
page.content:
THE{CONTACT MAGAZINE}WAS STARTED IN{ {FEBRUARY 1976}.{300}COPIES WERE PRINTED.{MR.GEOFFREY BAILEY}AND{ {MRS.EDWARD STUART}THOUGHT OF THE IDEA FOR A{VILLAGE MAGAZINE.}THE{CONTACT {MAGAZINE}IS DELIVERED TO HOUSES IN{ {FLEET, CHICKERELL, CHARLESTOWN, {COLDHARBOUR AND TO ONE CARAVAN CAMP.} IT TAKES 10 DAYS TO PREPARE THE{ {MAGAZINE.}6 PEOPLE HELP TO GET IT READY.3 PEOPLE STAPLE IT.25 PEOPLE DELIVER THE{MAGAZINE}TO 1,000 HOMES. THE{CONTACT}CONTAINS INFORMATION ABOUT{VILLAGE EVENTS, CHURCH SERVICES, { LOCAL HISTORY }OTHER INTERESTING THINGS.{CONTACTS}PRINTING AND OTHER EXPENSES ARE PAID FOR BY ADVERTISMENTS AND DONATIONS.THE{CONTACT MAGAZINE} CAME SECOND IN A{DORSET VILLAGE {PROJECT COMPETITION}.
{ }
